text: Area Code 800 is a toll-free telephone area code in the North American Numbering Plan (NANP). It is used for toll-free numbers, meaning the person making the call does not pay for the call; instead, the receiving party pays. It entered service in 1966. It is one of several toll-free area codes in North America. Other toll-free area codes include 833, 844, 855, 866, 877, and 888. These codes are not tied to a specific geographic region and can be used anywhere in the United States, Canada, and other countries participating in the North American Numbering Plan. Category:Telephone numbers in Canada Category:Telephone numbers in the United States
title: Area code 800
